events.name: Branch Entry 2025
events.description: Cultural programme organized by Cultural & Arts Committee for 3rd semester students at Dr. P. Dayananda Pai – P. Sathish Pai Main Stage

events.name: Ayudha Pooja Celebration
events.description: Dussehra celebration with Rangoli, Bhajanas, and laboratory poojas to seek divine blessings

events.name: Tech Fest 2025
events.description: Annual technical festival with hackathons, coding competitions, and guest lectures

events.name: Placement Drives
events.description: Multiple companies visiting campus for recruitment. Prepare well and participate actively

motivational_quotes: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
Education is the passport to the future. - Malcolm X
The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you. - B.B. King
Strive for progress, not perfection. - Unknown
Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead. - Nora Ephron
Engineering is the art of directing the great sources of power in nature for the use and convenience of man. - Thomas Tredgold
The engineer has been, and is, a maker of history. - James Kip Finch
